title: BRIEF-HNA Group Have Determined To Pursue Sale, Through One Or More Registered Public Offerings, Of Some Or All Of Hilton Worldwide Holdings' Common Stock That HNA Group Currently Hold ‍​

organizations.name: hna group currently hold ‍​ market news
hna group currently hold ‍​ reuters staff

text:
Market News April 5, 2018 / 1:13 PM / Updated 8 minutes ago BRIEF-HNA Group Have Determined To Pursue Sale, Through One Or More Registered Public Offerings, Of Some Or All Of Hilton Worldwide Holdings' Common Stock That HNA Group Currently Hold ‍​ Reuters Staff 1 Min Read 
April 5 (Reuters) - Hilton Worldwide Holdings Inc: 
* HAVE DETERMINED TO PURSUE SALE, THROUGH ONE OR MORE REGISTERED PUBLIC OFFERINGS, OF SOME OR ALL OF HILTON WORLDWIDE HOLDINGS' COMMON STOCK THAT HNA GROUP CURRENTLY HOLD ‍​ Source text: ( bit.ly/2IyrjfI ) Further company coverage:
